pages.text: To get stone seeds, you will need to mine the stone at the bottom of your island. Create a wooden pickaxe in the crafting table, then use blocks/slabs to get to the bottom of your island and mine the stone
Next, you need to collect 4 inferium essence and 4 prosperity shards from your plants.
After you get the stone seeds, plant it on farmland. Once it grows, harvest it for stone essence. You can craft cobblestone using the stone essence.
